goals__remit: The confederation of Swedish Enterprise represents +/-60 000 Swedish companies with more than 1,6 million employees.It covers 70% of the private sector in Sweden.A total of 50 sector and employer associations are members of the Confederation. The Confederation strongly supports free enterprise and well-functioning market economy. The Confederation works for long-term economic growth and prosperity, through promoting entrepreneurship, competition, lower taxes and the completion of the internal market and opening up world markets.
position: International Director & Head of Brussel's office
